20101205013616.000|20101205013617.667|CCO|325 FLIGHTS HAD TO BE CANCELED

20101205013631.000|20101205013632.250|CCO|HAPPENS A LOT IN THE MIDWEST 
20101205013632.250|20101205013633.500|CCO|OVER THE WINTER, 2 TO 3 TO 4 
20101205013633.500|20101205013634.750|CCO|INCHES, BUT WHAT PEOPLE
20101205013634.750|20101205013636.000|CCO|MIGHT NOT BE PREPARED FOR IS THE

20101205013651.000|20101205013653.000|CCO|FAHRENHEIT BELOW AVERAGE FOR 
20101205013653.000|20101205013655.000|CCO|THIS TIME OF YEAR.
20101205013655.000|20101205013657.000|CCO|IT WILL FEEL MORE LIKE 
20101205013657.000|20101205013659.000|CCO|MID JANUARY THAN EARLY DECEMBER.
20101205013659.000|20101205013701.000|CCO|AND WHILE A LITTLE BIT OF SNOW 
20101205013701.000|20101205013702.000|CCO|IN THE AIR TODAY MAY PEOPLE FEEL
20101205013702.000|20101205013703.000|CCO|IN THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT, I'M 
20101205013703.000|20101205013704.000|CCO|AFRAID
